title: Rachael Lee stuns in a figure-hugging white dress as she kisses new fiancé Braith Anasta in Bali
text:
They're enjoying a romantic holiday in Bali, after announcing their engagement last week.

And on Saturday, Rachael Lee and new fiancé Braith Anasta packed on the PDA.

Rachael took to Instagram to share a sweet snap of her kissing the former NRL star in a figure-hugging white dress in front of a water sculpture.

Getting ready for the big day? Rachael Lee (right) stunned in a figure-hugging white dress on Saturday as she kissed new fiancé Braith Anasta (left) in Bali

In the snap, the pair shared a sweet embrace, with Rachael captioning the image with a love heart emoji.

Rachael had her long locks out and over her shoulders in loose curls and wore a white knitted dress and nude sandals.

Meanwhile, Braith, 37, looked smart in a blue shirt and black shorts.

Wedding bells! On Tuesday, the pair announced their engagement, with Braith dropping to one knee to propose with their children by his side

On Tuesday, the pair announced their engagement, with Braith dropping to one knee to propose with their children by his side.

Rachael announced the news on Instagram, sharing a sweet video of the proposal, which appeared to have taken place at their home in Sydney's Eastern Suburbs.

'My amazing, love of my life and future husband and my three darling babeees (sic) surprised me w (sic) the most beautiful perfect proposal!' Rachael's post began.

He put a ring on it! Rachael announced the news on Instagram, sharing a sweet video of the proposal, which appeared to have taken place at their home in Sydney's Eastern Suburbs

'I've never been so surprised and blown away - it was pure perfection, I'm SO in love and happy!! We're getting MARRIED.'

She added: 'Braith, thank you for a perfect morning and the best surprise ever. I love you always.'

Braith - who was married to Jodi Anasta from October 2012 to December 2015 - began dating Rachael in 2016.

They share daughter Gigi, one, together, while Braith has daughter Aleeia, five, with ex Jodi, and Rachael Lee has an older son Addison, eight, from a previous relationship.
description: They're enjoying a romantic holiday in Bali, after announcing their engagement last week.
authors: Chloe-Lee Longhetti For Daily Mail Australia
